title: Re: Doorbell battery always empty.
text:
a week ago
I have had a Nest 2 battery doorbell connected to a transformer since February. But the battery is always empty and only sporadically records some video. I fear the reason is that I live on a busy street with hundreds of pedestrians and cycles passing every hour. What's the solution?
